1: לְֽ֭תַאֲוָה <sup>8378 </sup> <n>Through desire</n> יְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>himself seeketh</n> נִפְרָ֑ד <sup>6504 </sup> <n>a man having separated</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> תּ֝וּשִׁיָּ֗ה <sup>8454 </sup> <n>with all wisdom</n> יִתְגַּלָּֽע׃ <sup>1566 </sup> <n>[and] intermeddleth</n>

7: פִּֽי־ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>mouth</n> כְ֭סִיל <sup>3684 </sup> <n>A fool's</n> מְחִתָּה־ <sup>4288 </sup> <n>[is] his destruction</n> ל֑וֹ וּ֝שְׂפָתָ֗יו <sup>8193 </sup> <n>and his lips</n> מוֹקֵ֥שׁ <sup>4170 </sup> <n>[are] the snare</n> נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>of his soul</n>
